original_text: Then Jehoshaphat stood up in the assembly of Judah and Jerusalem at the temple of the Lord in the front of the new courtyard
korean_text: 여호사밧이 여호와의 전 새 뜰 앞에서 유다와 예루살렘의 회중 가운데 서서

sentences.original_text: in the assembly of Judah and Jerusalem
at the temple of the Lord
in the front of the new courtyard
